articles.title: At least 250 people feared dead after magnitude 5.9 earthquake hits eastern Afghanistan
articles.description: At least 255 people are feared dead and hundreds more wounded after a magnitude 5.9 earthquake hit eastern Afghanistan Wednesday, according to state-run news agency Bakhtar.
articles.content:
(CNN)At least 255 people are feared dead and hundreds more wounded after a magnitude 5.9 earthquake hit eastern Afghanistan Wednesday, according to state-run news agency Bakhtar.

articles.author: Marshall Cohen, Jeremy Herb and Zachary Cohen, CNN
articles.title: 7 takeaways from the fourth day of the January 6 hearings
articles.description: The latest hearing before the House select committee investigating the January 6 insurrection revealed new details Tuesday about how former President Donald Trump pressured state officials to help him overturn the 2020 presidential election.

articles.title: Justice Sonia Sotomayor continues her warnings of a dramatic conservative turn at the Supreme Court
